Erowid Experience Reports

Tidy data frame ready for text analysis. https://www.erowid.org/experiences/exp_front.shtml).

head(erowid)  # Print first 6 rows

Format

A data frame (tibble) with 24788 rows and 14 variables:

id
Report ID on Erowid database
title
Title of the report
author
Name or pseudonym of author
gender
Author's gender
age
Age of author at time of experience
kg
weight of author in kg
year
Year when experience occurred
published
When report was published on Erowid
rating
Categorical rating of report quality
views
Number of views
substance
The (list of) substances reported
text
Report text
erowid_warning
Logical: Did report contain Erowid warning
dosechart
List-column: Extra info on substance and dose

Source

https://www.erowid.org/experiences/exp_front.shtml
